casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. GODALE
v.
ELEVENTH DIST. COURT OF APPEALS 2018-0892 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 26, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. On respondent's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. Relator's motion for leave to amend complaint granted. O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, and DeWine, JJ., concur. O'Connor, C.J., and DeGenaro, J., concur in granting respondent's motion to dismiss but would deny relator's motion to amend complaint.
